jobs.title: €150k – SEO Lead – AI Startup  – Remote
jobs.description:
We’re introducing a rare chance to join a hyper-growth AI startup that has already reached 30M+ users worldwide and is on track to scale to 100M.
With strong leadership and a fully remote team of 70, they’re entering a new growth phase where SEO will be a key driver.
They’re seeking their first-ever SEO Lead to take full ownership of organic search, from technical SEO to authority-building.
In this role, every decision you make will directly impact the roadmap, visibility, and success of a company shaping the future of AI companionship.
Core ResponsibilitiesTechnical SEO: Conduct audits, implement fixes, and ensure SEO best practices are embedded in product and engineering workflows.On-Page SEO: Own optimization across metadata, internal linking, and landing pages; collaborate with content and product teams to align UX with SEO intent.Off-Page & Authority: Audit backlinks, manage disavow processes, and drive sustainable link-building strategies that boost authority.Analytics & Monitoring: Own SEO reporting via GA4, GSC, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, Moz; track KPIs and deliver actionable insights.Agencies & Partners: Manage agencies, freelancers, and creative partners, ensuring accountability and measurable outcomes.Strategy & Scale: Design and execute the SEO roadmap, develop scalable playbooks, and build a high-performing SEO team as the company grows.
What They Require7–10+ years hands-on SEO experience, ideally in growth-driven companies.Proven track record across technical, on-page, and off-page SEO.Mastery of tools such as GA4, GSC, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, and Moz.Experience in international SEO and adapting to algorithm updates.Strong ability to manage agencies and align content/copy with SEO.Fluent English with excellent communication and collaboration skills.
What They ValueOwnership & Velocity: A builder mindset who balances execution and strategy.Collaboration: Strong communicator, able to work across product, creative, and growth teams.Humility & Openness: Willing to learn, take feedback, and grow.Comfort with NSFW: You’re comfortable shaping products based on uncensored AI models.Leadership Potential: Ready to evolve into building and leading a full SEO team.
Compensation & PerksSalary: $100k – $150k (depending on experience).Contract: B2B preferred, flexible options available.Location: 100% remote work from anywhere.Benefits: 4 weeks PTO, company laptop, learning budget, wellness support, annual team gathering, GPT-5 & top-tier AI tools access.
Want to architect SEO as a core growth engine for one of the fastest-growing AI companies in the world? Apply now and help shape the path to 100M+ users.
